content:
The HIVRecord model in the IHE HIV Case Reporting and Monitoring IG does the following:
image.png

The treatment element is a CodeableReference. Is it legal to add the treatment.period element here even though a CodeableReference does not have a period? I would guess this is illegal, but the IG Publisher seems to think it is fine.
my goal with the IG publisher is to get legal things right. Illegal things are unpredictable. But you should get an issue in the QA report
I was mainly looking for confirmation that it is, indeed, illegal. If it was legal, that would mess w/ some of our logic in SUSHI. So I'm glad to hear we don't need to support it. Thank you.
